com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier

Class OutputSpeechSpeechletResponseVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier.OutputSpeechSpeechletResponseVerifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeechletResponseVerifier

    public class OutputSpeechSpeechletResponseVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpeechletResponseVerifier
    A SpeechletResponseVerifier to verify the size of the OutputSpeech returned in SpeechletResponseEnvelope. In the current implementation, the verify(SpeechletResponseEnvelope, Session) method logs a warning if the output speech size in bytes exceeds .

    Note: This verifier currently does not not enforce response checks and always returns true. The primary purpose of this verifier is to log a warning in the app developer's runtime.

        public boolean verify(SpeechletResponseEnvelope responseEnvelope,

        Description copied from interface: SpeechletResponseVerifier
        Verifies a SpeechletResponseEnvelope within the context of the Session in which it was received. Returns true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise.

        Parameters:

        session - Session context within which to verify the call
        Returns:
        true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise
